backup_config.description: Create a manual backup of the 'config.ini' file.

backup_db.description: Create a manual backup of the 'plexpy.db' file.

delete_all_library_history.description: Delete all Tautulli history for a specific library.

server_id.description: The Plex server identifier of the library section

section_id.description: The id of the Plex library section

row_ids.description: Comma separated row ids to delete, e.g. '2,3,8'

delete_all_user_history.description: Delete all Tautulli history for a specific user.

user_id.description: The id of the Plex user

row_ids.description: Comma separated row ids to delete, e.g. '2,3,8'

delete_cache.description: Delete and recreate the cache directory.

export_id.description: The row id of the exported file to delete

row_ids.description: Comma separated row ids to delete, e.g. '65,110,2,3645'

delete_hosted_images.description: Delete the images uploaded to image hosting services.

rating_key.description: 1234 (Note: Must be the movie, show, season, artist, or album rating key)

delete_all.description: 'true' to delete all images form the service

delete_image_cache.description: Delete and recreate the image cache directory.

delete_library.description: Delete a library section from Tautulli. Also erases all history for the library.

server_id.description: The Plex server identifier of the library section

section_id.description: The id of the Plex library section

row_ids.description: Comma separated row ids to delete, e.g. '2,3,8'

delete_lookup_info.description: Delete the 3rd party API lookup info.

rating_key.description: 1234 (Note: Must be the movie, show, artist, album, or track rating key)

delete_all.description: 'true' to delete all images form the service

delete_media_info_cache.description: Delete the media info table cache for a specific library.

section_id.description: The id of the Plex library section

delete_mobile_device.description: Remove a mobile device from the database.

mobile_device_id.description: The mobile device database id to delete

device_id.description: The unique device identifier for the mobile device

delete_newsletter.description: Remove a newsletter from the database.

delete_notifier.description: Remove a notifier from the database.

delete_recently_added.description: Flush out all of the recently added items in the database.

delete_synced_item.description: Delete a synced item from a device.

client_id.description: The client ID of the device to delete from

sync_id.description: The sync ID of the synced item

delete_temp_sessions.description: Flush out all of the temporary sessions in the database.

delete_user.description: Delete a user from Tautulli. Also erases all history for the user.

user_id.description: The id of the Plex user

row_ids.description: Comma separated row ids to delete, e.g. '2,3,8'

docs.description: Return the api docs as a dict where commands are keys, docstring are value.

docs_md.description: Return the api docs formatted with markdown.

export_id.description: The row id of the exported file to download

logfile.description: The name of the Tautulli log file, 'tautulli', 'tautulli_api', 'plex_websocket'
The name of the Plex log file, e.g. 'Plex Media Server', 'Plex Media Scanner'

edit_library.description: Update a library section on Tautulli.

section_id.description: The id of the Plex library section

custom_thumb.description: The URL for the custom library thumbnail

custom_art.description: The URL for the custom library background art

user_id.description: The id of the Plex user friendly_name(str): The friendly name of the user

custom_thumb.description: The URL for the custom user thumbnail

export_metadata.description: Export library or media metadata to a file

section_id.description: The section id of the library items to export

user_id.description: The user id of the playlist items to export

rating_key.description: The rating key of the media item to export

metadata_level.description: The level of metadata to export (default 1)

media_info_level.description: The level of media info to export (default 1)

thumb_level.description: The level of poster/cover images to export (default 0)

art_level.description: The level of background artwork images to export (default 0)

custom_fields.description: Comma separated list of custom fields to export in addition to the export level selected

export_type.description: 'collection' or 'playlist' for library/user export, otherwise default to all library items

individual_files.description: Export each item as an individual file for library/user export.

get_activity.description: Get the current activity on the PMS.

session_key.description: Session key for the session info to return

session_id.description: Session ID for the session info to return

config_path.description: The full path to the config file to import

backup.description: true or false whether to backup the current config before importing

returns.data: {'result': 'success', 'message': 'Config import has started. Check the logs to monitor any problems. ' 'Tautulli will restart automatically.' }

import_database.description: Import a Tautulli, PlexWatch, or Plexivity database into Tautulli.

app.description: 'tautulli' or 'plexwatch' or 'plexivity' database_file (file): The database file to import (multipart/form-data) or

database_path.description: The full path to the database file to import

table_name.description: For PlexWatch or Plexivity only, 'processed' or 'grouped'

backup.description: For Tautulli only, true or false whether to backup the current database before importing

import_ignore_interval.description: For PlexWatch or Plexivity only, the minimum number of seconds for a stream to import

returns.data: {'result': 'success', 'message': 'Database import has started. Check the logs to monitor any problems.' }

row_ids.description: Comma separated row ids to sign out, e.g. '2,3,8'

notifier_id.description: The ID number of the notification agent

headers.description: The JSON headers for webhook notifications

newsletter_id.description: The ID number of the newsletter agent

notify_recently_added.description: Send a recently added notification using Tautulli.

rating_key.description: The rating key for the media

notifier_id.description: The ID number of the notification agent. The notification will send to all enabled notification agents if notifier id is not provided.

pms_image_proxy.description: Gets an image from the PMS and saves it to the image cache directory.

refresh.description: True or False whether to refresh the image cache

return_hash.description: True or False to return the self-hosted image hash instead of the image

device_id.description: The unique device identifier for the mobile device

device_name.description: The device name of the mobile device

platform.description: The platform of the mobile devices

friendly_name.description: A friendly name to identify the mobile device

onesignal_id.description: The OneSignal id for the mobile device

min_version.description: The minimum Tautulli version supported by the mobile device, e.g. v2.5.6

search.description: Get search results from the PMS.

query.description: The query string to search for

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return per media type

server_status.description: Get the current status of Tautulli's connection to the Plex server.

mobile_device_id.description: The mobile device config to update

friendly_name.description: A friendly name to identify the mobile device

agent_id.description: The newsletter type of the newsletter

status.description: Get the current status of Tautulli.

session_key.description: The session key of the session to terminate

session_id.description: The session id of the session to terminate

message.description: A custom message to send to the client

undelete_library.description: Restore a deleted library section to Tautulli.

section_id.description: The id of the Plex library section

section_name.description: The name of the Plex library section

undelete_user.description: Restore a deleted user to Tautulli.

user_id.description: The id of the Plex user

username.description: The username of the Plex user

returns.data: {'result': 'success', 'update': true, 'message': 'An update for Tautulli is available.' }

update_metadata_details.description: Update the metadata in the Tautulli database by matching rating keys. Also updates all parents or children of the media item if it is a show/season/episode or artist/album/track.
